name: The Meeting (CodyTheOpulos)
description:
In the far future, society has advanced with technology. 

Space travel has become commercialized, and VR devices have become commonplace.

However, this advancement has come at a high cost. With the rise of civil unrest between mega-corporations and low-wage workers, the rise of immigration from barren countries to the Utopian city of Lunar Point, and the rise of VR Addiction with the easy access to the biggest VR companies' headsets; Axiom.

Two people have been chosen to represent two factions, Lunar Point and the world government. The two will come together to discuss and decide what course of action they will take for the future of humanity. 

This short visual novel will be released in parts due to the VN is being created using watercolor as a medium for this story.

Part 1 is currently out, coming next will be Part 2

For updates follow @CodyTheOpulos on Twitter and CodyTheOpulos on YouTube.
